p.note: An almost complete leaf, consisting of two pieces.
The meter has 4 x 15 syllables (7/8 or 8/7).
The colon boundary seems to fall inside the vowel sandhi: laukaññe+eṣpirttacce.
The plural form rilñeṣṣeṃ is strange; if it is not simply a mistake, the number may have been referring to two missing complements in the lacuna such as (prakrauñe epre)tñe.
